nodes.text: The 1000 Field Macrobinoculars were the standard model of macrobinoculars manufactured by Ziko. As with most macrobinoculars, the 1000 contained an internal readout which provided information on distance and land elevation. It also came with low-light vision mode and could be stored in an impact resistant case. Other variants were produced, including the 1020/A, a handheld pair equipped with a long-range audio pickup unit, and a head-strapped model, the 1125.
